title: ECLIPSE
description: Our Eclipse service offers an advanced photography solution that uses specific lighting to create product images without shadows and with exceptional clarity. Ideal for transparent, reflective, or complex objects, our Eclipse technology captures every detail with remarkable precision, while eliminating unwanted reflections.
features: Complete elimination of shadows and reflections
Perfect rendering of transparent and reflective materials
Uniform lighting across the entire surface
Ideal for jewelry, cosmetics, glassware, and luxury products

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.content: The Eclipse technique allows you to obtain images of unparalleled quality, highlighting every detail of your products. This solution is particularly suitable for objects that are difficult to photograph such as jewelry, glassware, or products with reflective surfaces.

items.title: Jewelry
items.description: Perfect capture of precious stones and shiny metals

items.title: Cosmetics
items.description: Enhancement of transparent packaging and textures

items.title: Glassware
items.description: Impeccable rendering of glass and crystal objects
